info.title: KMD Logic Document Generation Service API

get.summary: Gets an Azure Blob template storage configuration entry for a given document generation configuration managed by the subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the configuration to fetch.

parameters.name: hierarchyPath
parameters.description: The configuration entry ancestry path to the entry to be returned.

put.summary: Updates an Azure Blob template storage configuration entry for a given document generation configuration managed by the subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the configuration to fetch.

parameters.name: hierarchyPath
parameters.description: The configuration entry ancestry path to the entry.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Azure Blob template storage settings.

post.summary: Creates an Azure Blob template storage configuration entry for a given document generation configuration managed by the subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the configuration to fetch.

parameters.name: parentHierarchyPath
parameters.description: The configuration entry ancestry path to the parent entry.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Azure Blob template storage settings.

delete.summary: Deletes a storage configuration entry for a given document generation configuration managed by the subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configuration.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the configuration to having the entry to be deleted.

parameters.name: hierarchyPath
parameters.description: The configuration entry ancestry path to the entry to be deleted.

get.summary: Gets an Azure Blob template storage configuration entry for a given document generation configuration managed by the subscription.

parameters.name: configurationId

parameters.name: entryId
parameters.description: The configuration entry identifier of the entry to be returned.

parameters.description: Azure Blob template storage settings.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId

parameters.name: parentEntryId

parameters.description: Azure Blob template storage settings.

get.summary: Get all document generation configurations managed by the subscription.

parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The details of the configuration being created.

get.summary: Get the summary of a document generation configuration managed by the subscription by the id of the configuration.

parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId

parameters.description: The details of the configuration being updated.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription that owns the configurations.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the configuration to fetch.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Document generation parameters.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Document generation parameters.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Identifier of request to return.

get.summary: Gets URI to document generated for provided request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Identifier of request which document should be retuned.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of configuration to use.

parameters.name: hierarchyPath
parameters.description:
The hierarchy of possible template sources not including the master location. 
For example, if you have a customer "A0001" with a department "B0001" then the hierarchy path would be "A0001\B0001". 
If the department has no template source configured then the customers templates will be used.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Subject of created document.

get.summary: Gets metadata for a nominated template.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifier of Logic subscription.

parameters.name: configurationId
parameters.description: Identifier of configuration to use.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Identifier of the associated template.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code in ISO 639-2 format (e.g. en).

parameters.name: hierarchyPath
parameters.description:
The hierarchy of possible template sources not including the master location. 
For example, if you have a customer "A0001" with a department "B0001" then the hierarchy path would be "A0001\B0001". 
If the department has no template source configured then the customers templates will be used.

configurationId.description: Identifier of configuration to be used.

hierarchyPath.description:
The hierarchy of possible template sources not including the master location. 
For example, if you have a customer "A0001" with a department "B0001" then the hierarchy path would be "A0001\\B0001". 
If the department has no template source configured then the customers templates will be used.

templateId.description: Identifier of template to be used.

language.description: Language code in ISO 639-2 format (eg. en).

mergeData.description: Data to be merge into document.

callbackUrl.description: URL that is going to be called when document generation completes.

debug.description: Flag indicating if document generation should be run in diagnostic mode.

signConfigurationId.description: Identifier of sign configuration to be used.

configurationId.description: Identifier of configuration to be used.

sourceDocumentUrl.description: URL that identifies the document to be converted.

convertedDocumentPdfFormat.description: Optional PdfFormat of the converted document.

callbackUrl.description: URL that is going to be called when document generation completes.

debug.description: Flag indicating if document generation should be run in diagnostic mode.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Standard Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "bearer {token}". You can obtain that value from your browser Developer tools
